name: Majeed Wardak
story: Majeed was born in a small village in Afghanistan. His father worked as a farmer and his mother was a housewife. He had always been fascinated by the military and convinced his parents to let him join the local militia when he was just 15 years old. He quickly proved himself to be a skilled marksman and was recruited into the Taliban. Eventually, Majeed became disillusioned with the cause and fled to Iran, where he joined the OPFOR. Majeed is now one of the youngest members of his unit, but he's earned the respect of his superiors because of his talent with rocket launchers.
